articles.description: Driving the Skoda Kodiaq 2.0L Turbo Petrol AutomaticThe biggest change in the Kodiaq is under the bonnet. The 2.0L TDI diesel engine has been replaced by a 2.0L TSI petrol engine, which produces 187 BHP @ 4,200 - 6,000 rpm and 320 Nm @ 1,500 - 4,100 rpm. It i…
articles.content:
An extremely important addition to the 2022 Kodiaq is Skodas Dynamic Chassis Control (DCC). This lets you alter between a softer or stiffer suspension setup by simply switching the drive mode.
